thread.title: Glencore CDS Costs Soar On Poor Results
thread.title_full: Glencore CDS Costs Soar On Poor Results - WSJ

author: Christopher Whittall
title: Glencore CDS Costs Soar On Poor Results
text:
The price investors must pay to insure against a default on Glencore PLCâ€™s debt ballooned after poor results from the commodities giant.
As of the end of Wednesday, investors had to pay $340,000 to insure against $10 million of Glencore debt for five years using credit default swaps, or CDS, according to data group Markit. That is more than three times the price of insuring against a default last September. At the end of last week,... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
